entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
